content: prabhaatha namaskaaram
pattakkaaran:- shubaho
janam:- balaheenarum paapikalumaaya…

items.content: pattakkaaran:- dyvamaaya kartthaave! Bhaagyamullavayumprakaasham niranjirikkunnavayumaaya kathirukalaal njanga lute kannukale prakaashippikkaname. Maricchavarute ita yilninnulla ninte uyirtthezhunnelppudivasatthil njangale santhoshippikkayum, ninte karthruthvatthinte udayatthaal njangale aanandippikkayum cheyyaname. Njanga lute jeevante aashaabandhavum njangalute aathmaakkalute rakshithaavumaaya mashihaa! Nin്re krupaasahaayangalaal njangale thunaykkaname. Moraan vaalo haan laalmmeen. Aammeen.

content: eniyono
(briku dhaadee lashamaayone)

mahimayotakkabareennu pura-
ppettee srushtikale
shobhippicchoru shobhayathaam
yeshu sthuthyanaho.

Shemaonum yohannaanum
chennaa kabarinkal
sthuthi paati santhoshattho-
te poyavar thirike.

Aazhchayilaadyatthethaayee-
tunnee shuddhadine
aadyajanuyir poondezhunnelppi-
cchee manmayareyum.

Konnavare jeeviccheshu
lajjippicchathinaal
pallikalum dayaraakalumi-
nnaanandikkunnu,

mruthar thannaathmaakkaluminnaa
nandikkum krupayaam
panineeravarmeluyir poondo-
neshu veezhtthiyathaal.
baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menaolam…

rakshakane! Ninneyum nin
uththaanattheyum
kondaatunnatiyaarkkuyire-
kenam ninnarul pol.
kuriyelaayison.
eniyono
(kolo dshubaho)

1. Dyvamuyirtthu mahatthuvatthotaadaamineyum than-
makkaleyum jeevippicchu.
Doothaganam thalpathi'ye vaazhtthi bhoomi vilangi.
Bhramamotu kaavalkkaar ninnu.

2. Shemaonkeeppaa yohannaanotumonnicchee naal
akkabaritamathilekkoti.
Yaakkobaanandicchu, thommaa thrupthippettu,
matthaayi sthothram paati

3. Paathaalam pukkitayan vigrahaseva vitartthi
thannute sabhaye rakshicchu
jeevicchu mahatthuvatthotezhunnettathine shakthyaa
shathrukkalil ninnum veendu.

4. Veenjin lahariyozhinjavaneppol kartthaaveenaal
maranatthe vittunarvvote
mruthiye konnu thakartthappaathaalatthin vaathil
theertthoru nithyakkaalpeedtam.

5. Dyvamuyirtthu maricchavareenninnezhunnettettam
kaavalkkaaril bhramametti
mashihaa jeevicchennavaroorshlem pukkaartthathinaal
krooshicchavar lajjicchettam.
baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menolam ...

6. Nin varavortthu vasicchu maricchavar khinnare modi-
ppikkum nin thejasathine
kandinnedivasam thangalute thalakaluyartthi
nin krupaye sthuthi cheyyunnu.
kuriyelaayison.
19-aam masumoor
/taakaashangal dyvatthin്re mahatthuvatthe ariyikku nnu. Aakaashatthattu avan്re kyvelaye kaanikkunnu; pakal pakalinu vaakkine uccharikkunnu, raathri raathrikku arivine ariyikkukayum cheyyunnu.

/tavayute shabdam kelkkappetaattha bhaashayumilla; vaakkukalumilla. Bhoomiyil ellaayitavum avayute ari yippum bhoolokatthinte athirtthikalolam avayute vacha nangalum purappettirikkunnuavan avayil suryan്re mel avan്re kootaaram aticchu; athu thante manavarayilninnu purappetunna mana vaalan ennapole aakunnu. Paraakramamullavan enna pole than്re vazhi otuvaan santhoshikkum.
/taakaashatthinte attangalilninnu athinte purappaatum, aakaashatthinte aruthikalinmel athinte thaangalum aakunnu. Athinte aaviyil ninnu maravaayirikkunnathu (onnum) illa.

/tkartthaavin്re vedapramaanam kara illaatthathum, aathmaa vine thirikkunnathum aakunnu. Kartthaavin്re saakshi vishvaasayogyavum shishukkale jnjaanamullavaraakku nnathum aakunnu. Kartthaavin്re pramaanangal chovvalla vayum, hrudayatthe santhoshippikkunnavayum aakunnu. Kartthaavinte kalpana thiranjetukkappettathum, kannukale prakaashippikkunnathum aakunnu.

/t kartthaavinekkuricchulla bhayam vetippullathum, ennekkum nilanilkkunnathum aakunnu. Kartthaavinte nyaayavidhikal sathyamaayittullavayum, sakalatthilum neethiyaayittullavayum aakunnu. Ava svarnnatthekkaalum nalla rathnangalekkaalum aagrahikkatthakkavayum, theni nekkaalum thenkattayekkaalum maadhuryamullavayum aakunnu.

/tathrayumalla than്re daasan avayaal sookshikkappe tum. Avan avaye aacharicchaal valare prathiphalam kittum. Pizhakale thiricchariyunnavan aar? Rahasyakaarya ngalil enne kuttamillaatthavanaakkittheerkkaname.

/tdushtanmaar ennil adhikaarappetaathirippaanum paapangalil ninnu njaan vetippullavanaayirippaanumaayittu anyaayangalilninnu nin്re daasane thatayaname. En്re sahaayakkaaranum en്re rakshithaavumaaya kartthaave! En്re vaayile vachanangal nin്re ishtaprakaaravum, en്re hrudayatthile dhyaanam nin്re mumpaakeyum iri kkaname.
/tdyvame! Sthuthi ninakku yogyamaakunnu.
baarekmor. Shubaho... Menolam...
eniyono
(shamaayo mdeettho dmaalaake)

1. Mashihaa jeevicchezhunnettu;
kaavalkkaar lajjappettu.
Than priyayaam sabha santhosha-
tthaalaathmapriyane vaazhtthum.

2. Njaayardine keeppaa yoha-
nnaanmaarotthotippoyi,
guru mruthareennuyir poondette-
nnathu kettaaraanjituvaanaayu.

3. Rakshakane! Ninnuththaana-
tthin dinamaaminnatiyaaril
preethiyezhunnalavillaa kaa-
runyatthaal pokkuka kuttam.

4. Dayaraakal pallikalum sa-
nthosham kykkondinnaalil
puthran thannuththaanatthe
vaazhtthi sthothram paatunnu.
baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menolam

5. Nashtamathaam thannuruvam vee-
ndaadaammin jeernnashareeram
puthuthaakkaanaayu mruthaloka-
tthekkallo dyvamirangi.
kuriyelaayison.

/tkartthaavinu oru puthiya paattum, avante sthuthiye bhoomiyute athirtthikalilninnum paatuvin. Samudratthi lekku irangippokunnavarum, athilulla sakalavum, dveepu kalum, avayil kutiyirikkunnavarume! (kartthaavinu paatuvin).

/tvanavum athile graamangalum santhoshikkatte, kaador mecchilsthalangalaayirikkatte. Paarakalil kuti yirikkunnavar sthuthikkatte. Avar parvvathangalute muka lil ninnu aartthukollatte. Kartthaavinu mahatthuvam kotukkukayum, avan്re sthuthikale dveepukalil ari yikkukayum cheyyatte.
/tkartthaavu paraakrami ennapole purappetum. Avan yoddhaavu ennapole vaashiye jvalippikkum. Avan aartthu prabalappettu thante shathrukkale samharikkum.

/taakaashangale! Melilninnu aanandippin, meghangal neethiye thalikkatte. Bhoomi thurakkappetatte. Raksha varddhikka tte. Neethi onnicchu mulaykkumaaraakatte. Ivaye srushticcha kartthaavu njaanaakunnu. Dyvame! Sthuthi ninakku yogyamaakunnu.
baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menaolam
eniyono
(yoummono)

innaal nin-kabarinkal doothanmaar poondum vellanki
shishyakal nal dhoopasugandhakkoottukalotum poyu,
ariyicchavare - maalaakha, than sthu-thyamuththaanam.

Thiruvulamaayu mruthi poondakkabareenninguyirettu maanushare
veezhchayil ninnetti svarggakkoottatthotukoote
modippaan na-mme melippiccho-naayu sthothram.

Njaayardine-doothanmaar vellayaninjetthi kabararike
avariloraal neekkiya kallinmeleriyirunnu
akhileshan jee-vicchennariyicchaa-naarikale.
baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menaolam ...

naathaa! Nin-uththaanam dootharkkinneku-nnaanandam
ithu naarikal chonnarivaayathinaal shemaon keeppaa
santhoshikku-nnaanandikkunnaa-yohannaan.
kuriyelaayison.
eniyono
(leku dkeeso)

1 than mruthiyaalazhakaake nashi-
ppikkum maranatthe konni-
ttaakalkkarusaa than keezhil
ninnatiyaare veenda nina-
kkuchithaddhuvaniyil sthuthi paatu-
nnatiyaarellaarum.
baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menolam…

2 athula vishuddhasabhe! Praarththi-
ppaan nin makkaleyum kootti
sleebaayaal rakshiccha sutha-
nnaayi sthothram paatituka.
Uchithaddhuvaniyil sthuthi paatu-
nnatiyaarellaarum.
aammeen
eniyono
(sogedu loku moriyo)

1. Maanavar vaanor mun mun nin
mahimaye vandiccheetunnu.
Karunaanidhiyaam njangalute
kartthaave! Sthuthyan neeye.

2 njaayardinaminnuyaratthin
dvaarangal' thurakkappettu.
Poozhiyil mrutharaayu meviyavar-
kkulsharanamurappundaayi.

3. Moraaneesho! Ninnuththaa-
naal srushtikal modicchellaam.
Mruthar nee avare kabarul poyu
kandathinaal sthuthi cheyyunnu.
baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menaolam

4. Ekasuthan thaanuyirpundi-
parishuddhamathaam divasatthil
mashihaa jeeviccheetukayaal
man vinnulakukal modicchu.
mattoru eniyono
(lhou datthayeeno)

1. Yoodanmaar kurishil thookki,
thanne kabarathil vacchittum
uththaanatthaalulavaakum
lajjaashankayavarkkundaayu.
Haaleluyyaa u haaleluyyaa.

2. Seemaavaahi' paraakramiye
kabarul drohikal pootteettum
itivaal pole puratthaayu thaan,
mudraykkillaathoru ketum.
Haaleluyyaa u haaleluyyaa.

3. Naathan vilavaa velakkaa-
rotu cho-dippaanaayu vannu.
Avakaashamamartthaanavane
thoppin purame' avar thookki.
Haaleluyyaa u haaleluyyaa.
baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menolam ...

4. Kaanaatthathine theti than
lokam naathan pukkaare
kabaril thanne atacchavare
lajjippicchuththaanatthaal.
Haaleluyyaa u haaleluyyaa.
kuriyelaayison.
matthaayi 5:3-12
/taathmaavil daridraraayavar bhaagyavaanmaar; enthu kondennaal svarggaraajyam avarutethaakunnu.
/tduakhicchirikkunnavar bhaagyavaanmaar; enthukondennaal avar aashvaasappetum.
/tsaumyathayullavar bhaagyavaanmaar; enthukondennaal avar bhoomiye avakaashamaayi anubhavikkum.
/tneethikkaayi vishannu daahikkunnavar bhaagyavaanmaar enthukondennaal avar thruptharaakum.
/tkarunayullavar bhaagyavaanmaar; enthukondennaal avarutemel karunayundaakum.
/thrudayashuddhiyullavar bhaagyavaanmaar; enthukondu nnaal avar dyvatthe kaanum.
/tsamaadhaanam natatthunnavar bhaagyavaanmaar; enthukonda nnaal avar dyvatthin്re puthranmaarennu vilikkappetum.
/tneethi nimitthamaayittu peedippikkappetunnavar bhaagyavaa nmaar; enthukondennaal svarggaraajyam avarutethaakunnu.
/tavar ningale nindikkayum ningale peedippikkayum en്re nimittham sakala durvvachanattheyum ningalute nere vyaajamaayittu parayukayum cheyyumpol ningal bhaagyavaanmaar.
/tningalute prathiphalam svarggatthil varddhicchirikka kondu ningal santhoshicchu aanandippin.
baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menu olam
eniyono
(esdakryn moriyo)

1. Naathaa nin raajya-tthin mahimaagamane
sleebaacchirakaal-njangale mootikkollaname.

2. Naathaa! Nin raajya-tthin mahimaagamane
nin parishuddha-nmaarotatiyaar cherename.

3. Innekasuthan than-uththaane doothar
sthreekalkkaanandam-santhoshavumariyicchu.

4. Naathaa! Ninraajya-tthin mahimaagamane
nin naamatthe- ettoru njangale elkkename.
baarekmor.
pattakkaaran:- shubaho veekkoro vsegttho vraa busayoyuso neshve dnaasekku laabo valabro valruho kaadeesho.
janam:- menolam vaadaammolu olam olmmeenaammeen.

5. Naathaa! Nin raajya-tthin mahimaagamane
punyam njangal-kkum nalkeetu maricchorkkum.
sthaumenkaalosu. Kuriyelaayison.

items.content: pattakkaaran:- naam ellaavarum praarththicchu kartthaavinotu karunayum dayavum yaachikkanam.
janam:- kaarunyavaanaaya kartthaave! Njangalotu karuna cheythu njangale sahaayikkaname.
pattakkaaran:- sthuthiyum sthothravum, praabhavavum puka zhchayum, maanjupokaattha nalla unnathiyum, ellaa pozhum sadaaneravum, itavitaathe karettuvaan njangal yogyaraayittheeraname.

/tnaam thannotu apekshikkaathethanne, thante krupa moolam namme maranamillaatthavaraakkittheerppaanaayittu thiru vishtatthaal nammute atukkalekku varukayum, thante kashtaanubhavatthaal nammute kataccheettine keerikkalayukayum, maranamullathaaya nammute varggatthinu thante uyirtthezhunnelpu moolam maranamillaayma saujanyamaayitharukayum, melullavarkkum thaazheyullavarkkum than്re jeevicchezhu nnelpu moolam santhoshavum aanandavum daanam cheyyu kayum cheytha nalla utayavanu sthuthi. Prabhaathapraarththana yute ee samayatthum, sakala perunnaalukalilum, nera ngalilum, naazhikakalilum, kaalangalilum, njangalute aayushkkaalamokkeyilum, sthuthiyum, bahumaanavum, aaraadhanayum thanikku yogyamaakunnu. Bkulahan yoummoso dhaayyn lolmmeen.

pattakkaaran:- sakalatthinteyum srashtaavum nirmmaa thaavum shakthiparaakramangalotukootiyirikkunnavanumaaya dyvame! Ninte sneham moolam njangalute rakshaykku vendi thiruvishtatthaal kashtaanubhavatthinum, marana tthinum sleebaaykkumaayi nee ezhunnalli vannu. Shapikka ppetta janamaaya yahoodanmaaril ninnu aakshepavum nindayum parihaasavum sahicchu. Nee nyaayaadhipathimaarute nyaayaa dhipathiyaayirikkumpol naatuvaazhiyaaya peelaattho sin്re mumpaake nilkkukayum dushpravrutthikkaaranum kuttakkaaranum ennapole atikalaal chodyamcheyyappe tukayum cheythu. Kuttakkaaranum heenanum ennapole nyaayasthalatthu elpikkappettu. Athibhayabhakthiyotukoote kroobenmaarute puratthu aaghoshikkappetunnavanaayiri kkumpol ninte thiruvishtatthaal nindayin sleebaa mel thookkappettu. Seeppaayil nagnanaayi tharaykkappettappol sooryane athin്re sthalatthu andhakaarappetutthu kayum, nakshathrangale avayute nirakalilninnu veezhi kkukayum, chandranu rakthaniram kotukkukayum cheythu ashuddhappettirunna vaayumandalatthe nin്re thrukkykal viricchu shuddheekaricchu. Kadtoramaaya nin്re attahaasatthaal dyvaalayatthin്re thirasheela cheenthukayum, bhoomiye vira ppikkukayum, paarakal polikkukayum, kabarukal thura kkukayum cheythu. Nin്re paathaalapraveshanatthaal mara nattheyum saatthaaneyum kollukayum paathaalatthil undaayirunna maricchavarkku sharanavum santhoshavum jeevanum naashamillaaymayum prasamgikkukayum, paathaala tthil bandhikkappettirunnavare azhicchu vitukayum, paathaa latthinte agaadhakkuzhiyil kitannirunna vilangukaare puratthirakkukayum, kabaril undaayirunnavarute kazhutthu kale maruthalippukaaranaaya dushtanilninnu svaathanthuryappe tutthi rakshikkukayum cheythu. Sakala srushtikkum puthiya jeevan saujanyamaayi kotukkukayum lokatthe muzhuvanum nirappum samaadhaanavum manushyasnehavum kondu niraykkukayum cheythu. Jeevanteyum rakshayu teyum suvishesham prasamgippaanaayittu ninte vishuddha shleehanmaarotu kalpikkayum, dyvam kabarilninnu uyirtthezhunnettu ennum thante shathrukkal chitharippoyi ennum avar lokam okkeyum ariyikkukayum cheythu. Athinaal karunayullavanaaya kartthaave rakshikkunnathum jeevanundaakkunnathumaaya ee ninte uyirtthezhunnelpu divasatthil, njangal ninte krupa yotu apekshikkunnathenthennaal, njangale maranami llaatthavarum naashamillaatthavarumaakkittheerkkaname. Aakshepakaravum nindaakaravumaaya sakala vikaarangalil ninnum njangale svaathanthuyappetutthaname. Sakala durvvikaaranga lotum ethirtthu nilkkunnathinu njangal praaptharaa kuvaanaayittu jeevippikkunnathaaya nin്re shakthiyaal njangale aayudham dharippikkaname. Aakalkkarusaayeyum avante sakala synyangaleyum, ninnaal njangal jayikkumaaraakaname. Njangal ellaavarum nin്re randaa matthe ezhunnallatthine santhoshatthotukooti ethire lpaanaayittu nalla avasaanatthinum nirappulla purappaa tinum yogyaraayittheeraname. Njangalute katangalum paapa ngalum njangalotu kshamikkaname. Sathyavishvaasatthotu koote ninnil nidrapraapicchirikkunna vishvaasikalaaya njangalute maricchupoyavare neetheekaricchu bhaagyamulla bhava nangalil avare aashvasippikkaname. Njangal ninakkum, ninte pithaavinum, ninte vishuddha roohaaykkum, ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum sthuthiyum sthothravum kare ttum. Hosho

content: pattakkaaran:- dyvatthilninnu katangalkku parihaaravum, paapangalkku mochanavum…
janam:- aammeen.
kolo
(enono nuharo)

agnyaathmee-yanmaari-rerum
doothanmaarum thee poondaar
kaadeeshu kaa-deeshennaar-tthum ko-
ndinnaakabarinkal vannu.
/tdyvam kabareennuththaanam
/tcheythettam mahimaavote.
/tkaavalkkaar kandandhanmaa-
raayu, me-leenneerenmaare
avar kandaayu mruthare pole.
baarekmor. Shubaho ...

“mudraykki-lle sathyam-kete”-
nnaaraayunnaachaaryanmaar.
Onnicchu-ttharamathinavar-chonnaar
“mudraykkottum ketilla.
/tmrutharaayu njangaleyaakkittheer
/ttthaashcharyam varuvin kaanmaan
/tnjangal svapnam kaanunno?"
ennaa-lum dyvam kaattum
sathyatthe maravaakkaamo?
menolam…

vaangippo-ya pithrukkal-kkum bhraa-
thaakkalkkum nalkaashvaasam;
ninnaaraa-dhakare nin-parishu-
ddhanmaar samghatthil cherkka,
/tnee simhaasanamereettaa-
/tdushtanmaare neekkumpol
/tavar nin kaarunyam kandu
nin maa-haathmyamudikkumpol
valabhaagatthaayitenam.
moriyo…

items.content: pattakkaaran:- kartthaave! Nin്re vishuddhashareeram pooshu vaanaayittu sugandhaparimalaadikalotukoote vanna paripaa kathayulla sthreekaleppole sathkriyakalaakunna nallavasthrangalotum, kuttamillaattha natapatikalaakunna mahima yulla alankaarangalotum koote sthothrangalaal njangal thirumumpaake varumaaraakaname. Aa sthreekale ppole njangal ninne kandu aanandikkayum, ninte divyathyakkaalukal piticchu vandikkukayum cheyyumaaraaka name. Maalikayil vacchu ninte shishyanmaarennapole ninte samaadhaanatthaal njangal santhoshicchu aanandi kkayum, avarotukoote njangal ninneyum, ninte pithaa vineyum, vishuddha roohaayeyum sthuthicchu vandikkukayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Hosho aammeen.

content: kolo
(loku moriyo korenaan)

1. Dyvatthin puthrane mariyaamuththaanatthin-
shesham, thottakkaaran pol kandaal thottatthil
"neeyenthinu karayunnaare aaraayunnu?”
ennathi“nen naathaneyavar ko-
ndengo poyennaal."
/tthaanavale “mariyaame”yennaan;
/totippoyutanavalariyicchaal
kartthaavuththaanam cheythennaa shleehanmaare.
baarekmor. Shubaho ... Haaleluyyaa
haaleluyyaa menaolam

3. Than shuddhashareeram bhakshicchum than raktham
paanam cheythathum, mrutharaayor thannaathmaakkal mel
azhiyaaloke paapatthinnirul vaazhaayvaan
praarththiccheetuka naam mashihaa thannotavar perkkaayu
/tavaraathmaakkale vaangiya naathaa!
/tavar ninne kondaatiyathaale
neeyavare vilicchu niruttheetaname valabhaage.
evangeliyon
pesgomo

haale u haa ... U haa
naathanunarnnithurakkakkaaraneyum than
veenjinlahari vetinjoru purushaneyum pole - haaleluyyaa
(evangeliyonu shesham)
pothuvaaya dhoopapraarththana
kukkiliyon

ninnaal sthuthiyotu raajamakal haale... U haa ...
Nin valamaayu raajabhaaminiyum.

Nayavaan panapole thalirtthitume haale...U haa ...
Valarumavan lebanon kaarakil pol.

Makkalilappan krupa cheyathu pole haa...U haa...
Bhakthanmaaril dyvam krupa cheyyum.
baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menolam…
ekbo
(laaloho shubho broumme)

sthuthi dyvatthinnuyaratthil,
than maathaavinnunnathiyum.
Mahimaamuti sahadenmaarkkum,
mrutharil karunayumundaaka.
sthaumenkaalosu kuriyelaayison.
kolo
(shlomme daabo menroummo)

1. Thaathan shlommo gabreeyel
moolam meleennaa dhanya
/tmariyaaminu nalkappettu
/tthee poondon' vaayil thingum
shlommo chonnaan naathan nin
koote thannudayam ninnil.
baarekmor. Shubaho…

2. Shlommo! Than nibiyanmaarkkum
shlommo! Than shleehanmaarkkum
/tshlommo! Shlommo naathankal
/tkurerum sahadenmaarkkum
shlommo than makkal vasikkum
parishuddhasabhaykkum shlommo!
menaolam…

3. Naam dyvasuthanmaaraavaan
aayushkaalatthil cholli-
/ttthannetthaathare orkkenam
/tnayavaanmaar punyappetto-
ronnicchekumavarkkaashvaa
sam svargge puthran dyvam.
moriyo…
maar yaakkobin്re bovuso

1. Uththaanatthaal thansabhaye veendonaam puthraa!
Nin shyno nalki thanprajaye kaakkenam nee.

2. Chaave keezhaakki balavaan skeeppaa'yilurangi
moonnaam naalilunarnnezhunnettaan balavaanaayi.

3. Ksheenam maari moonnu dinam me-vi kurishinmel
ksheenicchonati kondu nashikkaathingezhunnettu.

4. Daavee-daam thaa-than than-varavi-ngane ka-ndappol
oti-cchennaa-veenayu-maayi kampi mu-rukki.

5. Chonnaan “matthu ku-ranja-manuja-nnoppam-naathan
mithra-ngalkkaa-nandavumarikal'-kkaartthi'yumeki”

6. Vinman lokarkkykyam nalkeetum shyno nin
uththaanatthaal nin sabhayil shyno nalkenam.

shuddhan nee aaloho! Haaleluyyaa
shuddhan nee balavaane! Kuriyelaayison.
Shuddhan nee mruthiheenaa! Krooshettone krupa cheytheetaname+

kartthaave! Krupa cheyyaname haaleluyyaa
kartthaave! Krupa cheyu kanivaal kuriyelaayison
kartthaave! Karmmaarththanakale-ettittavayaal krupa cheytheetaname.

Sthuthyan nee aaloho-haaleluyyaa
sthuthyan nee srashtaave! Kuriyelaayison
sthuthyan nee paapikalatiyaaril-krupa cheytheetum mashihaa-raajaave! Baarekmor.+
